verses.verse: Hear<WH8085> my cry<WH7440>, O God<WH430>; attend<WH7181> unto my prayer<WH8605>.
From the end<WH7097> of the earth<WH776> will I cry<WH7121> unto you<WH3820>, when my heart is overwhelmed<WH5848>: lead<WH5148> me to the rock<WH6697> that is higher than I<WH7311>.
For you have been a shelter<WH4268> for me<WH5797>, and a strong tower<WH4026> from<WH6440> the enemy<WH341>.
I will stay<WH1481> in your tabernacle<WH168> for ever<WH5769>: I will trust<WH2620> in the shelter<WH5643> of your wings<WH3671>. Selah<WH5542>.
For you<WH430>, O God, have heard<WH8085> my vows<WH5088>: you have given<WH5414> me the heritage<WH3425> of those that fear<WH3373> your name<WH8034>.
You will prolong<WH3254> the king<WH4428>'s life<WH3117>: and his years<WH8141> as many<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
He shall stay<WH3427> before<WH6440> God<WH430> for ever<WH5769>: O prepare<WH4487> mercy<WH2617> and truth<WH571>, which may preserve him<WH5341>.
So will I sing<WH2167> praise unto your name<WH8034> for ever<WH5703>, that I may daily<WH3117> perform<WH7999> my vows<WH5088>.
